ValidationRule.description: Prevents AE from updating amount-affecting fields after quote has been approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Status__c,"Approved"), OR( ISCHANGED(SBQQ__Quantity__c), ISCHANGED(SBQQ__NetPrice__c), ISCHANGED(SBQQ__AdditionalDiscount__c), ISCHANGED(SBQQ__NetTotal__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Edits impacting quote amount may not be made after quote is approved. Please create a new quote if you need to make changes.
